paper_title.en: In-Meclium Nucle on Mass Rencsmaligation Cetected in B Decays of Spin Aligned 12B and 12N
New Linit at the G-patity I rsagubar Weak Uucle Detected in B Decays of Spin Aligned 12B and 12N
Electromagnetic moments of the beta-emitting nucleus N-16

description.en: The nuclear magnetic dipole moment mu and electric quadrupole moment Q of the beta -emitting N-16(I-pi = 2(-), T-1/2 = 7.13 s) nucleus have been determined for the first time by detecting its beta -NMR in a MgO crystal and beta -NQR (nuclear quadrupole resonance) in a TiO2 crystal to be \mu\ = (1.9859 +/- 0.0011)mu (N) and \Q\ = (17.9 +/- 1.7) mb, respectively. Although the prediction of mu given by the Hartree-Fock calculation agrees well with the experiment, an abnormally small effective charge for neutrons is required to account for the experimental Q.

paper_title.en: Electromagnetic moments of the beta-emitting nucleus (19)O

description.en: The nuclear magnetic-dipole moment mu and electric-quadrupole moment Q of the short-lived beta-emitting nucleus (19)O(I(pi) = 5/2(+), T(1/2) = 27 s) have been determined by detecting its beta-NMR in CaO and TiO(2) crystals to be \mu\ = (1.53195 +/- 0.00007) mu(N) and \Q\ = (3.7 +/- 0.4) mb, respectively. Slight deviations of both values from the shell model predictions given by Hartree-Fock calculations demand further experimental and theoretical studies. (C) 1999 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.
